title: Adobe Illustrator Assistant for Laser Cutting Business (Part-Time, Long-Term Opportunity)
job_overview:
I'm looking for a reliable and detail-oriented Illustrator assistant to help prepare files for a growing laser cutting business. This is a long-term role for someone who is confident using Adobe Illustrator and enjoys following clear processes.

Youâ€™ll be working with customer orders to prepare names for cutting, following a step-by-step system (training provided). The work is repetitive but important and requires attention to detail.
